text: Berge Ragnar Furre (13 April 1937 - 11 January 2016) was a Norwegian historian, theologian and politician. He was a member of the Socialist People's Party (SF) and later Socialist Left Party (SV). He was the leader of the Socialist Left Party from 1976 until 1983. He was also known for work on 1900s Norwegian history. He was born in Sjernarøy, Finnøy. Furre died after an illness on 11 January 2016, aged 78. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Norway Category:Norwegian historians Category:Norwegian politicians
title: Berge Furre
